All downloaded songs in this playlist will be deleted from internal storage.
Tap to stream your favorite songs.
Listen and download your favorite songs. View top songs and curated playlists wherever you go!

Allow access to storage in Security > Permissions > Permissions > Storage > Music to be able to use Music normally.
"This song's format isn't supported or the file doesn't exist."
"プレイリストを削除しました。"
"プレイリストの名前を変更しました。"
"Sorry, the playlist isn't available. To delete it, press and hold, then choose delete."
You need to download this song before you can use it as a ringtone

Always wait for WLAN connection to download files

"Use Xunlei Accelerator to speed up downloads? The URL of the download's host will be uploaded to Xunlei's servers. Your Mi Account details will also be uploaded to check if you have any active subscriptions to this service."
Use %s of mobile data to download this file?
Use your mobile data connection to download this file?
"全曲繰り返しで再生します。"
"現在の曲を繰り返し再生します。"

No result. Please try other words
"サーバーエラー。しばらく待ってから後ほど再試行してください"

Show player widget in notification shade
"Couldn't share image due to a download error"
Stop player after a certain time
This song is already in the playlist
Song name can not be empty.
Sorry, this song is no longer available.
Update to the latest version of the Music app.
"Mi Music data plan is currently supported by China Unicom. Your network provider doesn't support this feature. You can buy regular mobile data."
People who liked this also liked

Sync your music across all your devices with Mi Cloud. Using your mobile data connection to sync music will increase your data usage. If you go over your plan’s data limit, your carrier could charge you additional fees.
You need to restart the app for this setting to take effect.
Buy tickets for shows, concerts, plays, and other events
You have used up your download quota for this month.
"Mi Accountにログインしてもう一度お試しください。"
Get Premium Song Pack to download this song.
Now playing in Standard quality. Get Premium Song Pack to enjoy High quality streaming.
Too many requests sent from this device.

"You're using Mi Music data plan provided by China Unicom. You should connect to a 3gnet network to stream songs without spending mobile data. Make sure you check network settings before streaming music."
"We're discontinuing our current streaming service due to copyright issues. Update to the newest version of the Music app to listen to high quality music."
Updates are ready. Restart to update.
"We're discontinuing our current streaming service while we resolve copyright issues. Sorry for the inconvenience :("
"We're discontinuing our current streaming service due to copyright issues. Update to the newest version of the Music app to listen to high quality music."
"You'll only be able to listen to music stored offline."
Your Music subscription will be renewed automatically this evening. Make sure you have enough Mi Credits in your account to complete this payment.
Add Mi Credits to renew your Music subscription.
"You won't be able to stream high quality audio, but some songs will be available in regular quality."
"You won't be able to stream high quality audio after your subscription expires."
Get Premium Song Pack to play this song. We have skipped it for you.
Get Premium Song Pack to play “%s”. We have skipped it for you.

"You're no longer connected to WLAN. Using your mobile data connection to complete this download will increase your data usage. If you go over your plan’s data limit, your carrier could charge you additional fees."
"Mi Musicの新バージョンにようこそ"

"You should use WLAN to complete this %s download.
Tap %s to start this download the next time you're connected to a WLAN network."
